scripts.gen:host:api: node tools/confirm.js 'This will overwrite any changes to several files in src/! These are likely hand-edited, so this could be very bad! Are you sure?' && node tools/gen_host_api.js
scripts.gen:host:wamr: node tools/confirm.js 'This will overwrite any changes to src/null0_api_host_wamr.h! Are you sure?' && node tools/gen_host_wamr.js
scripts.gen:host:web: node tools/confirm.js 'This will overwrite any changes to headers/null0_web_host.mjs! Are you sure?' && node tools/gen_host_web.js
scripts.gen:cart:c: node tools/confirm.js 'This will overwrite any changes to headers/null0.h! Are you sure?' && node tools/gen_cart_c.js
